title: Rotherham hospital: Man dies after fight between patients
article: A hospital patient has been arrested on suspicion of murdering another patient who died after a fight. Police were called to Rotherham District General Hospital at about 20:55 GMT on Saturday to reports that two men had been fighting. One of the patients, aged 48, died of his injuries in the early hours. A 47-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of murder. Police said they were working with the hospital to establish what had happened. Follow BBC Yorkshire on Facebook , Twitter and Instagram . Send your story ideas to yorkslincs.news@bbc.co.uk .
